attributes.action: Finance Medical Research in the UK for the condition Fibromyalgia Syndrome
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a sufferer of F.M.S I would appreciate that the UK research this condition.  There are similarities between this and M.E especially the sleep disorder side of things but it goes much further then this.  A better understanding of the condition is needed and a goal should be set to try and help sufferers and bring them together to express how it affects their everyday living.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Finance Medical Research in the UK for the condition Fibromyalgia Syndrome."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13170.asp

Prime Minister's Office
